title: The Dirk Diggler Story
description: For Dirk Diggler, the future is something to look forward to, not to fear. He is a creative man of many interests: film, poetry, karate, music, and dance. He is a man of passion and mystery. He is a man of lust.
quote: I only am who I am because I was born that way.
altHero: Dirk Diggler looks pensive while standing on a bridge
alt1: Diggler in sunglasses giving an interview
alt2: Reed Rothchild talking, making animated hand gestures
alt4: Diggler with director Jack Horner in the editing room
